html:
Magellan Partners SAS, a catalyst for the digital transformation of its customers, has announced to acquire Daveo SAS, a company specializing in product management and public cloud consulting on AWS (Amazon Web Services) and GCP (Google Cloud Platform). Both the companies involved in the transaction are based in France.
